mapper.select: select * from USERDETAIL,TBLUSER where USRID = #{id} AND USERDETAIL.usrNum = TBLUSER.usrNum

select club.cbtype, club.cbleadernum, club.cbname, club.cbnum, club.cbfile from club,clubmember,tbluser where club.cbnum = clubmember.cbnum and clubmember.usrnum = #{usrNum} and club.cbleadernum=tbluser.usrnum and tbluser.USRSTATE ='회원' and club.CBFINALSTATE = '진행중' and clubmember.cbmbstresult = '가입승인' order by clubmember.cbappdate desc

select club.cbnum,club.cbname,club.cbtype,club.cbfile from clubjoinhistory,club,tbluser where clubjoinhistory.USRNUM = #{usrNum} and clubjoinhistory.CBJOINSTATERESULT = '승인대기' and tbluser.usrNum=club.cbLeadernum and tbluser.USRSTATE='회원' and clubjoinhistory.cbnum = club.cbnum and (clubjoinhistory.cbjoinnum,clubjoinhistory.cbnum,clubjoinhistory.usrnum) in (SELECT MAX(cbjoinnum),cbnum,usrnum FROM clubjoinhistory GROUP BY cbnum,usrnum)

select CLUBJOINHISTORY.usrNum,CLUBJOINHISTORY.cbNum,CLUBJOINHISTORY.cbName,CLUBJOINHISTORY.cbType,club.cbFile,max(cbjoinnum) from CLUBJOINHISTORY,club where USRNUM = #{usrNum} and CBJOINSTATERESULT = '모임탈퇴' and cbfinalstate = '진행중' and CLUBJOINHISTORY.cbnum = club.cbnum group by CLUBJOINHISTORY.usrNum,CLUBJOINHISTORY.cbNum,CLUBJOINHISTORY.cbName,CLUBJOINHISTORY.cbType,club.cbFile order by max(cbjoinnum) desc
mapper.update: update TBLUSER set USRPWD = #{usrPwd}, USRCHANGEPWDDATE = sysdate where USRNUM = #{usrNum}
mapper.insert: insert into USERHISTORY(usrHistoryNum, usrNum, usrName, usrState, usrStateUpdateDate) values(userhistory_seq.nextval, #{usrNum}, #{usrName}, #{usrState}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from CLUB where CBLEADERNUM = #{usNum} and CBFINALSTATE != '폐쇄' AND CBFINALSTATE != '강제폐쇄' order by cbNum asc
select * from CLUB,THUNDERDETAIL where CLUB.CBNUM = #{cbNum} and CLUB.CBNUM = THUNDERDETAIL.CBNUM and CBNAME = #{cbName}
mapper.update: update USERDETAIL set USRCITY1 = #{usrCity1}, USRDISTRICT1 = #{usrDistrict1}, USRCITY2 = #{usrCity2}, USRDISTRICT2 = #{usrDistrict2}, USRCATEGORY1 = #{usrCategory1}, USRCATEGORY2 = #{usrCategory2} where USRNUM = #{usrNum}
mapper.select: select * from REGION where RGCLASSIFICATIONCODE is null
select * from REGION where RGCLASSIFICATIONCODE = (select RGCODE from region where RGNAME = #{rgName})
select USRIMG, USRIMGPATH from TBLUSER where USRIMGPATH = to_char(sysdate -1,'yyyy\mm\dd')

select * from tbluser, clubjoinhistory where cbnum = #{cbNum} and clubjoinhistory.usrnum = tbluser.usrnum and clubjoinhistory.cbjoinstateresult in ('가입승인','승인대기') and (clubjoinhistory.cbjoinnum,clubjoinhistory.cbnum,clubjoinhistory.usrnum) in (SELECT MAX(cbjoinnum),cbnum,usrnum FROM clubjoinhistory GROUP BY cbnum,usrnum) order by (case when clubjoinhistory.usrnum = (select cbleadernum from club where cbnum=#{cbNum}) then 3 when clubjoinhistory.cbjoinstateresult = '가입승인' then 2 when clubjoinhistory.cbjoinstateresult = '승인대기' then 1 end) ,clubjoinhistory.cbjoinnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into CLUBJOINHISTORY(CBJOINNUM, USRNUM, CBNUM, CBNAME, CBTYPE,CBJOINSTATERESULT,CBJOINSTATEUPDATEDATE) values(clubjoinhistory_seq.nextval, #{usrNum}, #{cbNum}, #{cbName}, #{cbType}, #{cbJoinStateResult}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update CLUB set CBFINALSTATE = '폐쇄', CBSHUTDATE = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') where CBNUM = #{cbNum}
update CLUB set CBFINALSTATE = '폐쇄', CBSHUTDATE = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') where CBLEADERNUM = #{usrNum}
mapper.insert: insert into CLUBMEMBER(USRNUM, USRNAME, CBNUM, CBTYPE, CBNAME, CBMBSTRESULT,CBMEMINTRO,CBAPPDATE) values(#{usrNum},#{usrName},#{cbNum}, #{cbType}, #{cbName}, #{cbJoinStateResult}, #{cbMemIntro}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from clubmember where usrNum = #{usrNum} and cbNum = #{cbNum}

select club.cbFile,club.cbName,club.cbType,club.cbNum,club.cbname from clublike,club where usrNum = #{usrNum} and likecheck = 1 and clublike.cbnum = club.cbnum and club.cbfinalstate = '진행중' order by clublike.likenum desc
